Belgium: Guilds of Ghent take up arms against the Count of Flanders, Philip the Good.
India: Bahlul Khan Lodhi ascends the throne of the Delhi sultanate starting the Lodhi dynasty
Indinesia: Rajasawardhana, born Bhre Pamotan, styled Brawijaya II succeeds Wijayaparakramawardhana as ruler of Majapahit.
Slovenia: Celje acquires town rights by orders from Frederick II, the Count of Celje.
